billing-success-page.product-ready: Your SaaS product is ready and eager to help you maximize the usage of your time and serve your customers. Say goodbye to tedious set up and hello to just building.
billing-success-page.thank-you: Thank you for trusting React Router SaaS Template. Your successful journey towards building and maintaining a SaaS product starts now!

contact-sales.company-name-must-be-string: Your company name must be a string.
contact-sales.company-name-too-long: Your company name must not exceed 255 characters.
contact-sales.contact-sales-description: We'll discuss your requirements, demo the product, and set up the right plan and pricing for you.
contact-sales.contact-sales-title: Talk to our sales team about your needs.
contact-sales.first-name-must-be-string: Your first name must be a string.
contact-sales.first-name-too-long: Your first name must not exceed 255 characters.
contact-sales.last-name-must-be-string: Your last name must be a string.
contact-sales.last-name-too-long: Your last name must not exceed 255 characters.
contact-sales.message-must-be-string: Your message must be a string.
contact-sales.message-placeholder: Describe your project, needs and timeline.
contact-sales.message-required: Please enter a message describing your needs (required).
contact-sales.message-too-long: Your message must not exceed 5000 characters.
contact-sales.phone-number-must-be-string: Your phone number must be a string.
contact-sales.phone-number-placeholder: Where do you want us to call you?
contact-sales.submit-disclaimer: By submitting this form, I agree to be contacted by the sales team.
contact-sales.thank-you: Thank you for contacting us. We will get back to you shortly.
contact-sales.work-email-invalid: Please enter a valid work email, including '@' and '.'.
contact-sales.work-email-must-be-string: Your work email must be a string.
contact-sales.work-email-too-long: Your work email must not exceed 255 characters.

disabled-plans-alert.description-plural: You currently have {{currentSeats}} users, and the {{plan1Title}} plan only supports {{plan1Capacity}} user while the {{plan2Title}} plan only supports {{plan2Capacity}} users. Please choose a plan that supports at least {{currentSeats}} seats.
disabled-plans-alert.description-singular: You currently have {{currentSeats}} users, and the {{planTitle}} plan only supports {{planCapacity}} user. Please choose a plan that supports at least {{currentSeats}} seats.
disabled-plans-alert.title: Why are some plans disabled?
